00014 void ServerInspector::NetworkError(SmppNwIf* smppIf) {
00015 
00016         AutoMutex a(mtx);
00017         m_logger->trace("ServerInspector::NetworkError() was called by %s",
00018                         smppIf->GetSystemId().c_str());
00019         ServerProcessor *srvProc = dynamic_cast<ServerProcessor*> (proc);
00020         ClientConnection* clntConn = srvProc->GetClient(smppIf->GetSystemId());
00021         Connection* conn = NULL;
00022         if (clntConn != NULL) {
00023                 switch (smppIf->GetBindType()) {
00024                 case bindReciever:
00025                         conn = clntConn->rv;
00026                         clntConn->rv = NULL;
00027 
00028                         break;
00029 
00030                 case bindTransmiter:
00031                         conn = clntConn->tm;
00032                         clntConn->tm = NULL;
00033 
00034                         break;
00035 
00036                 case bindTranciever:
00037                         conn = clntConn->tx;
00038                         clntConn->tx = NULL;
00039                         break;
00040                 }
00041         } else {
00042                 m_logger->warn("can't find client with system id %s for disconnecting",
00043                                 smppIf->GetSystemId().c_str());
00044                 return;
00045         }
00046 
00047 
00048         if ((clntConn->rv == NULL) && (clntConn->tm == NULL) && (clntConn->tx
00049                         == NULL)) {
00050                 m_logger->info("Client with sys id %s disconnected(%u, %u, %u)",
00051                                 smppIf->GetSystemId().c_str(), clntConn->rv, clntConn->tm,
00052                                 clntConn->tx);
00053                 srvProc->UnRegisterClient(smppIf->GetSystemId());
00054         } else {
00055                 m_logger->trace(
00056                                 "Client with sys id %s already have active connections",
00057                                 smppIf->GetSystemId().c_str());
00058         }
00059 
00060         if (conn != NULL) {
00061                 delete conn;
00062         }
00063 
00064 }

00066 ServerInspector::ServerInspector(XmlConfigPtr cfg) :
00067         Inspector() {
00068         MT_LOGINIT(ServerInspector);
00069         //m_logger = LoggerFactory::getInstance()->getLogger("ServerInspector");
00070         addr = cfg->get("host");
00071 
00072         std::string portStr = cfg->get("port");
00073         port = atoi(portStr.c_str());
00074         serverSock = NULL;
00075         systype = "VMA";
00076         type = bindTransmiter;
00077         //      recvBuf = new char[RECBBUFLEN];
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 int ServerInspector::Init() {
00082 
00083         m_logger->debug("try bind to address %s, port %u", addr.c_str(), port);
00084 
00085         try {
00086                 serverSock = new TCPSocket();
00087                 serverSock->Listen((char*) addr.c_str(), port);
00088         }
00089         catch (std::exception e) {
00090                 m_logger->warn("can't listen %s %u", addr.c_str(), port);
00091                 return -1;
00092         };
00093 
00094         return 0;
00095 }

00108 bool ServerInspector::CheckClient(BindParams params) {
00109 
00110         bool ret = true;
00111 
00112         ServerProcessor* servProc = dynamic_cast<ServerProcessor*> (proc);
00113         ClientConnection* conn = servProc->GetClient(params.sysId);
00114 
00115         if (conn != NULL) {
00116 
00117                 switch (params.type) {
00118                 case bindReciever:
00119                         if ((conn->rv != NULL) || (conn->tx != NULL))
00120                                 ret = false;
00121                         break;
00122                 case bindTranciever:
00123                         if ((conn->tm != NULL) || (conn->tx != NULL) || (conn->rv != NULL))
00124                                 ret = false;
00125                         break;
00126                 case bindTransmiter:
00127                         if ((conn->tx != NULL) || (conn->tm != NULL))
00128                                 ret = false;
00129                         break;
00130                 }
00131         }
00132         return ret;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void ServerInspector::runLoop() {
00136 
00137         TCPSocket * sock = NULL;
00138         ServerProcessor* servProc = dynamic_cast<ServerProcessor*> (proc);
00139 
00140         try {
00141                 if (!IsActive()) {
00142 
00143                         sock = serverSock->Accept();
00144                         MT_LOGTRACE("try accept new connection");
00145 
00146                         if (sock != NULL) {
00147                                 BindParams params = RecvBind(sock);
00148                                 SendBindResp(sock, params.type);
00149 
00150                                 ClientConnection* clntConn = servProc->GetClient(params.sysId);
00151                                 if (clntConn == NULL) {
00152                                         clntConn = new ClientConnection();
00153                                 }
00154 
00155                                 if (!CheckClient(params)) {
00156                                         MT_LOGWARNING("client with system id %s and such type already connected " << params.sysId.c_str());
00157                                         delete sock;
00158                                         return;
00159                                 }
00160 
00161                                 Connection* conn = new Connection(params.type,
00162                                                 servProc->GetInQ());
00163                                 clntConn->SetConnection(params.type, conn);
00164 
00165                                 Sender* sndr = new Sender(conn->out, this);
00166                                 conn->sender = sndr;
00167                                 sndr->SetBindType(params.type);
00168                                 sndr->setSystemId(params.sysId);
00169                                 sndr->SetSocket(sock);
00170                                 sndr->start();
00171 
00172                                 Reciver *rcvr = new Reciver(conn->in, this);
00173                                 conn->reciver = rcvr;
00174                                 rcvr->SetBindType(params.type);
00175                                 rcvr->SetSocket(sock);
00176                                 rcvr->setSystemId(params.sysId);
00177                                 rcvr->start();
00178 
00179                                 servProc->RegisterClient(params.sysId, clntConn);
00180                                 m_logger->trace(
00181                                                 "initialization for client %s passed successfully",
00182                                                 params.sysId.c_str());
00183                         } else {
00184                                 m_logger->warn("can't accept new connection");
00185                         }
00186 
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         catch (std::exception e) {
00190                 m_logger->warn("can't init connection from addr %s, port %d",
00191                                 addr.c_str(), port);
00192                 if (sock != NULL) {
00193                         m_logger->trace("delete sock");
00194                         delete sock;
00195                 }
00196                 sleep(1);
00197         };
00198 }
00199 
00200 }
